column1: sophiedelima,Sophie,de Lima,Associate Director at PwC | Energy Transition - Deals & Advisory,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQGzkOyRSrsM_w/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0/1517603422315?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=7n4jYxTuvgjiTU5T12AOjX_LR_b9EmM100BUI3OATXQ,,personal,ACoAAAYl6VwBFgeSovgJwuRRbIKgflufkGet3tk,103147868,,"Commercial and financial advisor, lawyer & sustainability enthusiast with 12 years of experience working in energy transition, environmental, ESG, private equity and infrastructure deals and transaction advisory. I support clients to solve decarbonisation business issues by using my strategic thinking and commercial acumen. My recent experience includes bid management, strategy and lead transaction advisory & management in the renewable energy (solar and wind) and carbon sectors.
I am passionate about engaging with technology to achieve the optimal solutions and ways of working for my team and clients.
Energy transactions & strategy • M&A • ESG • Commercial • Financial  • Insurance • Global Experience • Change Management
Full EU working rights. Australian & British citizen.

column2: Leading and project managing multiple service offerings across a transaction

Working creatively to find innovative solutions and problem-solve

Collaborating with senior stakeholders including workshop facilitation
Strong communicator and experienced working in a multi-disciplinary / cross cultural team

'company': 'PwC Australia', 'description': 'Financial and commercial advisory services to investors seeking capital to decarbonise their operations or develop renewable energy projects.

Role includes:

Business development and client relationship management - tracking opportunities and relationships using CRM (Salesforce)
Deal origination and development: preparation and presentation of pitches to potential clients
Supporting clients with a capital raise (preparation of IM, flyer, other investor material)
Transaction management: leading day-to-day relationship with clients developing a project and undertaking an M&A
Preparation of transaction documents including the information memorandum, financial models and other investor materials,
Assessment of commercial and strategic rationale for a transaction
External and internal management - communication and workshop facilitation
Coaching and managing junior team members
Reviewing assumptions in the financial model
Leading the business units implementation of Salesforce
Leading thought leadership and external client events on behalf of the team.', 'title': 'Associate Director | Energy Transition - Deals & Projects', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Sydney, Australia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'PwC Australia', 'description': 'Financial and commercial advisory services to financial investors and corporates investing in the energy and environmental sectors.

Skills: financial modelling, commercial advisory, project development, contract negotiations, contract management; presentation preparation; stakeholder management.', 'title': 'Manager | Environmental Transactions & Advisory', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1096648, 'name': 'Marsh & McLennan Companies', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D560BAQFxPaMFAFxT9A/company-logo_400_400/0/1688590057695?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=EfKygqdOWNoLDbedIxwRjOw2fJevZdIlnmkPvFzFnH0', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/marshmclennan/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Sydney, Australia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'Marsh McLennan', 'description': 'M&A risk and insurance advisory services covering the Pacific region. 

Responsible for developing and maintaining client relationships, increasing M&A engagements and undertaking lead risk management and insurance due diligence advisory services to private equity and infrastructure funds and strategic investors.', 'title': 'Vice President | Private Equity and M&A Services (Pacific)', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'London, United Kingdom', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'Marsh McLennan', 'description': None, 'title': 'Vice President | Private Equity and M&A Services (EMEA)', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'London, United Kingdom', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'Marsh McLennan', 'description': ""Successfully completed the two year graduate development programme in Marsh's UK M&A practice.

Key areas of experience obtained include:
- M&A project management and consulting through the end-to-end deal process.
- Supported senior relationship managers on key accounts, including data analysis of deal trends.
- Portfolio management post deal to exit.
- Private equity / portfolio analytics and research (using Salesforce, Mergermarket and Excel).
- Insurance and risk due diligence: assisted throughout the end to end M&A  due diligence process.
- Analysing the total cost of insurable risk.
- Calculating how this may be impacted by the acquisition.
- Highlighted uninsured risks and quantified the impact of insuring verus self-insuring.
- Member of the Young Professionals Corporate Group; organised an event for graduates in the industry with over 50 attendees and senior management presenting. 
- Supported the sales team and cross selling professional services to existing clients."", 'title': 'Graduate | Private Equity and M&A Services (EMEA)', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company':
